title: A proclamation for apprehending several traitors and fugitives
author: Scotland. Privy Council.
publisher: printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson,
notes: At end of text: Given under our signet, at Edingburgh, the twenty fourth day of June, 1685. And of our reign the first year.
Arms 237; Steele notation: Arms,  tor  manner.
